A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wait for video. On its own merits this film will leave you disappointed; if you paid to see it in a crowded theater it will leave you disappointed AND annoyed.\n\nPerformances were good\, but the story elements can be put into two groups: Things that don't make sense for that character and things that are pointless.  I have to imagine talks of a Rian Johnson trilogy are to save face and that those movies will never happen.  At least I hope not.
